properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 2:43AM CST until January 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City KS
properties.description:
...Widespread Accumulating Wet Snow Expected Tonight and Tuesday
Morning...

* WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3
to 5 inches possible.

* WHERE...Pawnee and Stafford Counties.

* WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult with heavy wet snow.
Expect reduced visibility and hazardous road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This storm is expected to impact the
morning commute to work and school Tuesday morning.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
